locations.name: Museum Lobby
locations.description:
The lobby of the museum.
The main entrance is blocked by debris.
There are three exits (North, East, and West)

items.name: Map
items.description: A visitors map...could come in handy.

locations.name: Old Kingdom Exhibit
locations.description:
You are in the Old Kingdom Exhibit.
There are three exits (North, East, and South).

locations.name: Dark Ages Exhibit
locations.description:
You are in the Dark Ages Exhibit.
There are four exits (North, East, South, and West).

locations.name: Koto Exhibit
locations.description:
You are in the Koto Exhibit.
There are three exits (North, South, and West).

locations.name: CrossRoads
locations.description:
You are at a crossroads.
There are four hallways (North, East, South, and West).

locations.name: Homeopathy Exhibit
locations.description:
You are in the Homeopathy Exhibit.
There are four exits (North, East, South, and West).

items.name: Potion
items.description: A healing potion is a potion that can be healed by a player.

There are four exits (North, East, South, and West).

items.name: Scimitar
items.description: A sword with a curved blade.

items.name: Katana
items.description: A weapon specialized in mid-range combat and are capable of inflicting slash and thrust

locations.name: Armor Exhibit
locations.description:
You are in the Armor Exhibit.
There are three exits (East, South, and West).
To the North there are three doorways. (Door 1, Door 2, and Door 3)

items.name: Jazerant
items.description: A medieval light coat of armour consisting of mail between layers of fabric or leather.

items.name: Chainmail
items.description: A armor consisting of small metal rings linked together in a pattern to form a mesh

items.name: Yoroi
items.description: Armor made of small pieces of lacquered metal that were connected with silk laces and cords

locations.name: Modern Egypt Exhibit

You are in the Modern Egypt Exhibit.
There are two exits (North and South).

locations.name: Escaped
locations.description: Congratulations! You have escaped the museum.
